A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film defies the expectations normally associated with a Star Wars film. Where Star Wars traditionally held to a simple plot and trusted well tested tropes\, this one steps away from that. The plot is complex\, deals with socio-political issues head on\, and takes you right to the edge of expected tropes and nopes out at the last second. I enjoyed it immensely and would have given it 5 starts except for the fact that some of the humor seemed oddly placed. Seeing Carrie Fisher on screen did make me ugly cry.
